original_text:
Max Megaways
Vi piacciono i film con protagonista un agente segreto, che vive recluso in un posto improbabile, sempre pronto a sconfiggere il cattivo di turno? Sì? Allora Max Megaways farà di sicuro al caso vostro. Ci troviamo infatti davanti a una montagna, che però una montagna non è, ma il rifugio segreto del nostro protagonista. Sullo sfondo si nota il mare placido e le nuvole che attraversano un cielo azzurrissimo, forse lo stesso dell’Australia, paese di origine della Big Time Gaming, sviluppatore di questa bella slot.
Puntate adatte a ogni tasca
In Max Megaways abbiamo una griglia con sei rulli che possono ospitare da due a sette simboli per ogni Spin. Il meccanismo a cascata fa sì che a seguito di una combo vincente tutti i simboli paganti vengano rimossi e sostituiti con altri del tutto nuovi. Il rullo orizzontale superiore è destinato a quattro simboli ed è l’unico che possa accogliere i simboli speciali. La puntata minima è di 0,20 € e come tutte le slot Megaways, anche qui i modi per vincere sono tantissimi, ad essere precisi ben 117.649.
Si vince quando si associano almeno tre simboli identici. Per chi si annoia a dover cliccare continuamente il tasto Play, consigliamo di attivare la modalità Autoplay che permette di attivare da 5 a 100 giri automatici.
La volatilità è alta il dato RTP corrisponde al 96,32%.
Diversi Bonus, regolari e speciali
Passiamo ora a dare un’occhiata ai simboli regolari, che sono dieci. Come in tutte le slot, anche in Max Megaways le carte da gioco sono quelli che valgono meno, seguiti dalle pietre preziose. Il simbolo Wild ricopre la classica funzione di Jolly, compare solo sul rullo orizzontale e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto gli Scatter. Questi sono rappresentati dalla valigetta dell’agente segreto: uno contiene dei lingotti d’oro, l’altro un diamante. vediamo ora cosa cambia nel caso atterri l’uno o l’altro. Nel caso dei lingotti, con tre Scatter riceveremo dieci giri gratuiti e potremo aprire due delle cinque porte comparse sullo schermo. Nel caso del diamante, potremo aprire tre porte. Dietro di esse si celano dei potenziatori che vediamo nel dettaglio:

Moltiplicatore Doppio: alle vincite viene applicato un moltiplicatore doppio
Wild duplicati: ogni jolly che atterra trasforma tutto il rullo in Wild
2 Scatter aggiuntivi: riceveremo ulteriori Free Spins
Maggiori possibilità di vittoria: sui rulli appariranno almeno cinque simboli
Simboli alto livello: sui rulli atterreranno solo i simboli delle pietre preziose

Durante il gioco base potrà capitare di vedere comparire uno dei seguenti modificatori casuali:

Maximum Megaways: tutti i rulli avranno 7 simboli, così da poter giocare per i 117.649 modi per vincere
Vertical Wild: tutti i simboli di un rullo vengono trasformati in Jolly
Horizontal Wild: i simboli del rullo orizzontale viene trasformato in Jolly
Wild Bomb: un Wild speciale esplode distruggendo i simboli che poi verranno rimpiazzati da altri simboli del tutto nuovi.

 
Domande Frequenti 
Quanti sono i modi per vincere?

In Max Megaways i modi per vincere sono 117.649



Il ritorno teorico al giocatore di Max Megaways è buono?

Il valore RTP si attesta sul 96,37%, al di sopra della media della maggior parte dei giochi di slot, molto buono!



Dove posso giocare a Max Megaways?

In tutti i maggiori casinò legali, quelli certificati AAMS, gli unici affidabili!

raw_translation.response:
Max Megaways

Are you a fan of spy movies? Do you enjoy the thrill of defeating villains in a secret hideout? If so, Max Megaways is the perfect slot game for you. The backdrop is a mountain that doubles as the protagonist's secret refuge, complete with calm seas and blue skies reminiscent of Australia, where Big Time Gaming, the developer of this beautiful slot, originates.

A Wager for Every Pocket

Max Megaways has six reels that can accommodate two to seven symbols per spin. The cascade mechanism ensures that all paying symbols are removed and replaced with new ones following a winning combination. The top horizontal reel can hold four symbols and is the only one that can accommodate special symbols. The minimum wager is €0.20, and like all Megaways slots, there are many ways to win. To be precise, there are 117,649 ways to win.

To win, match at least three identical symbols. For players who dislike continuously clicking the Play button, we recommend activating the Autoplay mode, which enables automatic spinning from five to 100 spins.

The game's volatility is high, with a RTP of 96.32%.

Various Regular and Special Bonuses

Let's take a look at the ten regular symbols, starting with the cards, which are worth the least, followed by precious stones. The Wild symbol serves as a classic wild, appearing only on the horizontal reel and replacing all symbols except for Scatter symbols. These are represented by the spy's suitcase: one containing gold bars and the other a diamond. Let's see what happens when either one lands. With three gold bar Scatters, we'll receive ten free spins and be able to open two of the five doors on the screen. With the diamond, we can open three doors. Behind them are the following power-ups:

Double Multiplier: All winnings receive a double multiplier.
Duplicated Wilds: Every wild that lands transforms the entire reel into wilds.
Two Additional Scatters: We'll receive extra free spins.
Enhanced Win Potential: At least five symbols will appear on the reels.
High-Level Symbols: Only precious stone symbols will land on the reels.

During the base game, players may see one of the following random modifiers appear:

Maximum Megaways: All reels will have seven symbols, allowing players to play for the 117,649 ways to win.
Vertical Wild: All symbols on a reel are transformed into wilds.
Horizontal Wild: The symbols on the horizontal reel are transformed into wilds.
Wild Bomb: A special wild explodes and destroys symbols, which are then replaced with new ones entirely.

Frequently Asked Questions

How many ways to win does Max Megaways have?

Max Megaways has 117,649 ways to win.

Is the theoretical return to player of Max Megaways good?

The RTP value is 96.37%, which is above average for most slot games, and it's very good!

Where can I play Max Megaways?

In all major legal casinos, such as those certified by AAMS, which are the only reliable ones!

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics and features

Max Megaways is a six-reel slot game that can hold from two to seven symbols per spin. It has a cascading mechanism that removes all paying symbols and replaces them with brand new ones after a winning combo. The game offers from 5 to 100 automatic spins for players using the Autoplay mode. There are 117,649 ways to win and players win when at least three identical symbols are associated.

Volatility and RTP

The game's volatility is high, and the theoretical return, or RTP value, is 96.32%, which is good and above the average of most slot games.

Regular symbols and paytable

Max Megaways has ten regular symbols, with the playing cards having the lowest value and the precious stones. The Wild appears only on the horizontal reel and replaces all symbols except for the Scatters. The Wild and regular symbols form winning combos when three or more of the same kind land.

Scatter symbols and bonuses

The Scatter symbols are represented by the secret agent's suitcase containing gold bars or a diamond. Three Scatters trigger ten Free Spins, and two to three doors appear on the screen, depending on the type of Scatter. Each door has an enhancer, which can be a Double Multiplier, Duplicated Wilds, 2 additional Scatters, Increased chances of winning or High-level symbols. During the base game, random modifiers, such as Maximum Megaways, Vertical Wild, Horizontal Wild, and Wild Bomb, may appear to boost players' chances of winning.

Availability and certification

Max Megaways is available in all major legal casinos certified by AAMS, the only reliable certification for online gaming in Italy.

Review: Max Megaways
If you're a fan of movies with a secret agent protagonist, who lives in an unlikely place, always ready to defeat the bad guys, then Max Megaways is definitely for you. We find ourselves in front of a mountain, which is actually not a mountain, but the secret refuge of our protagonist. In the background, we can see the calm sea and the clouds crossing a sky as blue as the one in Australia, the country of origin of Big Time Gaming, the developer of this beautiful slot.

Bets for every budget
In Max Megaways, we have a grid with six reels that can hold from two to seven symbols for each spin. The cascading mechanism means that following a winning combo, all paying symbols are removed and replaced with brand new ones. The top horizontal reel is destined for four symbols and is the only one that can accommodate special symbols. The minimum bet is € 0.20 and like all Megaways slots, there are many ways to win, to be precise, 117,649.

You win when at least three identical symbols are associated. For those who get bored of continuously clicking the Play button, we recommend activating the Autoplay mode, which allows you to activate from 5 to 100 automatic spins.

The volatility is high, and the RTP figure corresponds to 96.32%.

Different regular and special bonuses
Let's now take a look at the regular symbols, which are ten. As in all slots, even in Max Megaways the playing cards are the ones that are worth the least, followed by the precious stones. The Wild symbol covers the classic function of the Jolly, appears only on the horizontal reel and replaces all symbols except for the Scatters. These are represented by the secret agent's suitcase: one contains gold bars, the other a diamond. Let's see now what changes if one or the other lands. In the case of the bars, with three scatters, we receive ten free spins and can open two of the five doors that appear on the screen. In the case of the diamond, we can open three doors. Behind them are the enhancers that we see in detail:

Double Multiplier: a double multiplier is applied to the wins
Duplicated Wilds: every wild that lands transforms the entire reel into wilds
2 Additional Scatters: we receive additional free spins
Increased chances of winning: at least five symbols appear on the reels
High-level symbols: only precious stone symbols land on the reels

During the base game, one of the following random modifiers may appear:

Maximum Megaways: all reels have 7 symbols, so we can play for the 117,649 ways to win
Vertical Wild: all symbols on a reel are transformed into Jolly
Horizontal Wild: symbols on the horizontal reel are transformed into Jolly
Wild Bomb: a special wild explodes, destroying the symbols that are then replaced by totally new symbols.
